com.eurosonic.eurosonicut

Interface IEurosonicUTGateSettings


  • public interface IEurosonicUTGateSettings
    Interface to control gate settings

    • Method Detail

      • setEchoStartMode

        void setEchoStartMode(short ch,
                    int mode,
                    int edgeCount)
        Setup EchoStart gate mode and edgeCount detection
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        mode - Number of the echo detection. 1:Peak, 2:ZeroCrossing, 3:Over threshold
        edgeCount - Number of the echo detection (1 to 10)

      • setEchoStartStart

        void setEchoStartStart(short ch,
                     float start,
                     float offset)
        Setup EchoStart gate start position
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        start - position µs
        offset - visualisation before detection µs (0 to 2.55µs)

      • setEchoStartThreshold

        void setEchoStartThreshold(short ch,
                         float threshold,
                         int polarity)
        Setup EchoStart gate threshold
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        threshold - value % (0 to 100)
        polarity - Detection polarity 0:both, 1:positive, 2:negative

      • setEchoStartWidth

        void setEchoStartWidth(short ch,
                     float width)
        Setup EchoStart gate width
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        width - value µs

      • setGateMode

        void setGateMode(short ch,
               int gateIndex,
               int type)
        Setup gate mode
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        gateIndex - Gate index (0 to 2)
        type - detection : - 0 : No detection (gate off) - 1 : First Peak AMP/First Peak TOF - 3 : Max Peak AMP/Max Peak TOF

      • setGateStart

        void setGateStart(short ch,
                int gateIndex,
                float start)
        Setup gate start position
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        gateIndex - Gate index (0 to 2)
        start - position µs

      • setGateThreshold

        void setGateThreshold(short ch,
                    int gateIndex,
                    float threshold)
        Setup gate threshold
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        gateIndex - Gate index (0 to 2)
        threshold - value % (0 to 100)

      • setGateWidth

        void setGateWidth(short ch,
                int gateIndex,
                float width)
        Setup gate width
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        gateIndex - Gate index (0 to 2)
        width - value µs
